description: Students continue to develop their oral and written expression through the exploration of
issues important to the Francophone world outside France (national, cultural and linguistic
identities) and through reading, discussing and writing about a wide variety of different
texts. Focus is on vocabulary expansion, review of the French verb system and other key
grammatical structures, especially through regular written work. Prerequisite: French 231 or
placement.  Offered Fall and Spring Semesters.
